# docs/ - Documentation

## Overview

Complete documentation for the SOMA project.

## Contents

This folder contains comprehensive documentation including:

- API documentation
- Architecture guides
- Deployment guides
- Integration guides
- Performance documentation
- Training guides

## Key Documents (Root Level)

See the root level for important guides:

- `SANTOK_TOKENIZATION_GUIDE.md` - Complete tokenization guide
- `SANTOK_EMBEDDINGS_GUIDE.md` - Embeddings documentation
- `SANTOK_GPT5_ARCHITECTURE.md` - Architecture documentation
- `RAILWAY_OPERATIONS_GUIDE.md` - Deployment guide
